name: Simple CV template
description:
Instructions

the file is set up with components and auto-layout, so you can quickly customise the look and feel and add more sections if needed.

If you need two or more pages, like in the example, you need to export the frames as separate PDF files and combine them afterwards. Here is How to combine 2 pdf documents in mac os.


Notes

✅ variants

✅ components

✅ auto layout
